alert.note: Alert for Atoka; Coal; Johnston (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 7:57AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Johnston, southeastern Coal and west central Atoka Counties through 830 AM CST... At 757 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fillmore, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atoka, Coalgate, Wapanucka, Stringtown, Lehigh, Tushka, Coleman, Olney, Fillmore, Phillips, Boggy Depot Park and southwestern Atoka Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
